field.name: title
field.value: A Button with an onclick handlers

field.name: description
field.value: In this example, a button is displayed with an inline event attached that shows an alert message.

field.name: xml
field.value: <button width="200" height="26" left="176" top="111" label="I'm a Button. Try clicking me" > <action:when event="onclick" xmlns:action="urn:aviarc:widget:com.aviarc.toronto.widget.core.action:1"> <action:alert message="I was clicked"/> </action:when> </button>

field.name: description
field.value: A group box is given the raised class and a title, and within it another group-box is positioned using the edge offsets

field.name: xml
field.value: <group-box left="20" top="20" height="300" width="500" class="raised" title="Title goes here"> <group-box left="10" right="10" top="30" bottom="10" /> </group-box>
